steps.title: Darshana Basics
steps.description: Meet Maya, a curious student who discovers that Indian philosophy isn't just ancient texts—it's a living map of reality itself.

steps.title: Nyaya
steps.description: Maya learns to think clearly through Nyaya's logical framework, discovering how to distinguish truth from illusion in everyday life.

steps.title: Vaisheshika
steps.description: Exploring the atomic theory of reality, Maya understands how everything in existence is built from fundamental building blocks.

steps.title: Samkhya
steps.description: Maya discovers the profound distinction between consciousness and matter, learning the 24 principles that make up reality.

steps.title: Yoga
steps.description: Through the eight limbs of yoga, Maya transforms her understanding into practice, finding peace in the midst of life's chaos.

steps.title: Mimamsa
steps.description: Maya learns the science of right action, understanding how duty and ethics form the foundation of a meaningful life.

steps.title: Vedanta
steps.description: In her final realization, Maya discovers that the Self and the Absolute are one—the ultimate truth that liberates the soul.
